comment.author: 37865451@N00
comment._content: This is August Belmont, Jr. en.wikipedia.org/wiki/August_Belmont,_Jr. Eleanor Robson Belmont, English actress en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Eleanor_Robson_Belmont "She worked as an actress for ten years before retiring when she was married to August Belmont Jr. They were inseparable from 26 February 1910 until his death on 10 December 1924." Possibly Mrs. William Butler Duncan? "William Butler Duncan, known as Butler Duncan, was born in New York in 1853. His father, William Butler Duncan was from Scotland, and completed his college education in this country. He became a banker in New York City and then President and Chairman of the Board of the Mobile & Ohio Railroad Company from 1874 until his death in 1912." www.mysticseaport.org/Library/manuscripts/coll/coll215/co...
